subject: Apcal~is (Tadalafil)--The "S.u.p.e.r V.i.a.g.r.a" hkoprigmo
body:
Any problems during the intercourse?? Try Viagra.




Intercourse is more mutually-rewarding than ever.
There is no tension over potential ED. No more frustration
on her part, nor performance-anxiety on yours.
This results in a wonderfully fulfilling physical experience,
followed by intense emotional-bonding.
